title: Elven Cloaks
rules_text: The “Elven Cloaks” special Hunt tile is now in play. Add the tile to the Hunt Pool when the Fellowship is on the Mordor Track.

title: Elven Rope
rules_text: (C) The “Elven Rope” special Hunt tile is now in play. Add the tile to the Hunt Pool when the Fellowship is on the Mordor Track.

title: Phial of Galadriel
rules_text: (C) The “Phial of Galadriel” special Hunt tile is now in play. Add the tile to the Hunt Pool when the Fellowship is on the Mordor Track.

title: Sméagol Helps Nice Master     (C)
rules_text: The “Sméagol Helps Nice Master” special Hunt tile is now in play. Add the tile to the Hunt Pool when the Fellowship is on the Mordor Track.

title: It is a Gift (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in the
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in the same region as the Fellowship. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll and Leader re-roll.

title: It is a Gift (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in the
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in the same region as the Fellowship. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll and Leader re-roll.

title: It is a Gift (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in the
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in the same region as the Fellowship. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll and Leader re-roll.

title: It is a Gift (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in the
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in the same region as the Fellowship. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll and Leader re-roll.

title: Mithril Coat and Sting
rules_text: Play on the table. After the Shadow player draws a Hunt tile, you may discard “Mithril Coat and Sting” to force him to re- place the tile just drawn with an- other one. Apply the effects of the second tile, then return the first tile to the Hunt Pool.

title: Axe and Bow
rules_text: (C) Play on the table if Gimli or Legolas are in the Fellowship. After the Shadow player draws a Hunt tile, you may discard “Axe and Bow” to reduce the Hunt damage by one (to a minimum of zero). Any remaining Hunt damage must be confronted normally. You must discard this card from the table immediately if both Gimli and Legolas leave the Fellowship.

title: Horn of Gondor
rules_text: (C) Play on the table if Boromir is in the Fellowship. After the Shadow player draws a Hunt tile, you may discard “Horn of Gondor” to reduce the Hunt damage by one (to a minimum of zero). Any remaining Hunt damage must be confronted normally. You must discard this card from the table immediately if Boromir leaves the Fellowship.

title: Wizard’s Staff
rules_text: (C) Play on the table if Gandalf the Grey is in the Fellowship. You may discard “Wizard’s Staff” to prevent the Shadow player from drawing a Hunt tile. You must discard this card from the table immediately if Gandalf the Grey leaves the Fellowship.

title: Blade of Westernesse (6)
requirements: Play if a Hobbit is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Hobbit is in the battle. Use one hit during the Leader re-roll to eliminate one Minion of your choice that is participating in the battle.

title: Mighty Attack (4)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. Before rolling the dice for your Leader re-roll, forfeit the Leadership of one Companion participating in the battle to automatically change one missed die roll to a hit.

title: Mighty Attack (4)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. Before rolling the dice for your Leader re-roll, forfeit the Leadership of one Companion participating in the battle to automatically change one missed die roll to a hit.

title: Servant of the Secret Fire (3)
requirements: Play if Gandalf is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if Gandalf is in the battle. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.

title: Athelas
rules_text: Roll three dice and heal one Corruption point for each die result of 5+. If Strider is the Guide, heal one Corruption point for each die result of 3+ instead.

title: There is Another Way
rules_text: Heal one Corruption point. Then, if Gollum is the Guide, you may also hide or move the Fellowship (following the normal movement rules).

title: I Will Go Alone
requirements: Play if at least one Companion is in
rules_text: Play if at least one Companion is in the Fellowship. Separate one Companion or one group of Companions from the Fellowship. You may move the Companions one extra region. Then, heal one Corruption point.

title: Bilbo’s Song
rules_text: Heal one Corruption point. If Gollum is the Guide, heal two Corruption points instead.

title: Andûril (4)
requirements: Play if Strider/Aragorn is in the
rules_text: Play if Strider/Aragorn is in the battle. Before rolling the dice for your Leader re-roll, forfeit Strider’s Leadership to automatically change one missed die roll to a hit, or forfeit Aragorn’s Leadership to auto- matically change up to two missed die to hits.

title: Mirror of Galadriel
rules_text: Change any one unused Character Action Die result into a Will of the West Action Die result. Then, if the Fellowship is Lórien, heal one Corruption point.

title: Heroic Death (6)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before you remove casualties in- flicted by your opponent’s Combat roll and Leader re-roll, you may eliminate a Leader to cancel one hit, or eliminate one Companion to cancel a number of hits equal to or less than the Companion’s Level.

title: Heroic Death (6)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before you remove casualties in- flicted by your opponent’s Combat roll and Leader re-roll, you may eliminate a Leader to cancel one hit, or eliminate one Companion to cancel a number of hits equal to or less than the Companion’s Level.

title: Challenge of the King
requirements: Play if Strider/Aragorn is with a Free
rules_text: (C) Play if Strider/Aragorn is with a Free Peoples Army in Gondor or Rohan. Draw three Hunt tiles. If all three drawn tiles show Eyes, put them back in the Hunt Pool and eliminate Strider/Aragorn. Otherwise, discard permanently the drawn tiles bearing an Eye for the remainder of the game. All drawn tiles not bearing an Eye are put back in the Hunt Pool.

title: Sudden Strike (2)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an addi- tional attack using a number of dice equal to your Leadership (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.

title: Daring Defiance (0)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. Forfeit the Leadership of all the Companions participating in the battle to cancel the effects of the Combat card played by the Shadow player.

title: Gwaihir the Windlord
rules_text: (C) Move or separate one Companion or one group of Companions from the Fellowship as if their Level were 4. The movement of these Companions is allowed to end in a Stronghold under siege.

title: Fateful Strike (6)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. If your Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, additionally eliminate a Nazgûl (if present). If the re-roll scores two or more hits, you can eliminate a Minion (if present) instead of a Nazgûl.

title: We Prove Swifter
rules_text: Move or separate from the Fellowship one Companion or one group of Companions. You may move them two extra regions. The movement of these Companions is allowed to end in a Stronghold under siege.

title: Daring Defiance (0)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. Forfeit the Leadership of all the Companions participating in the battle to cancel the effects of the Combat card played by the Shadow player.

title: Daring Defiance (0)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. Forfeit the Leadership of all the Companions participating in the battle to cancel the effects of the Combat card played by the Shadow player.

title: There and Back Again
rules_text: Separate one Companion or one group of Companions from the Fellowship. You may move them one extra region. Then, if Gimli or Legolas are in Dale, Erebor or the Woodland Realm, activate the Dwarven and North Nations and advance the Dwarven, Elven, and North Nations one step each on the Political Track.

title: The Eagles are Coming              (C)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Army containing a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Army containing a Companion is adjacent to, or is in the same region as, a Shadow Army containing a Nazgûl. Roll a die for each Nazgûl present (up to a maximum of five dice) and eliminate a Nazgûl for each roll of 5+. All surviving Nazgûl must immediately be moved to any one Sauron Stronghold controlled by the Shadow player. The Witch-king is not affected by this card.

title: Brave Stand (3)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. The Shadow player rolls one die less in his Combat roll for each Compan- ion present (to a minimum of one).

title: The Ents Awake:  Entmoot       (C)
requirements: Play if Saruman is in play and Gandalf
rules_text: Play if Saruman is in play and Gandalf the White is a Rohan region or in Fangorn. Roll three dice; for each result of 4+, score one hit against a Shadow Army in Orthanc. If all Army units in Orthanc are elimi- nated or if there is not a Shadow Army there, eliminate Saruman. If a Companion is in Fangorn, you may immediately play another Character Event card from your hand without using an Action Die.

title: Nameless Wood (5)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn, or Orthanc. If your Combat roll or Leader re-roll score at least one hit, score two additional hits. 21

title: Heroic Death (6)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before you remove casualties inflicted by your opponent’s Combat roll and Leader re-roll, you may eliminate a Leader to cancel one hit, or eliminate one Compan- ion to cancel a number of hits equal to or less than the Companion’s Level.

title: Dead Men of Dunharrow          (C)
requirements: Play if Strider/Aragorn is in any
rules_text: Play if Strider/Aragorn is in any Rohan Region. Move Strider/Aragorn (and any number of Companions in the same region) to Erech, Lamedon or Pelargir. If there is a Shadow Army in that region, roll a die. That Army takes a number of hits equal to the die result and must then retreat. If the Army cannot retreat, it is de- stroyed, so are any Nazgûl and Minions along with it. You may then recruit up to three Gondor regular units in that region.

title: Sudden Strike (2)
requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using a number of dice equal to your Leadership (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.

title: The Ents Awake:  Treebeard    (C)
requirements: Play if Saruman is in play and Gandalf
rules_text: Play if Saruman is in play and Gandalf the White is a Rohan region or in Fangorn. Roll three dice; for each result of 4+, score one hit against a Shadow Army in Orthanc. If all Army units in Orthanc are eliminated or if there is not a Shadow Army there, eliminate Saruman. If a Companion is in Fangorn, you may immediately play another Character Event card from your hand without using an Action Die.

title: The Ents Awake:  Huorns          (C)
requirements: Play if Saruman is in play and Gandalf
rules_text: Play if Saruman is in play and Gandalf the White is a Rohan region or in Fangorn. Roll three dice; for each result of 4+, score one hit against a Shadow Army in Orthanc. If all Army units in Orthanc are eliminated or if there is not a Shadow Army there, eliminate Saruman. If a Companion is in Fangorn, you may immediately play another Character Event card from your hand without using an Action Die.

title: Ent’s Rage (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn, or Orthanc. Add 2 to all dice on your Combat roll.

title: House of the Stewards              (C)
requirements: Play if Boromir is in a Gondor
rules_text: Play if Boromir is in a Gondor region. Recruit one Gondor unit (Regular or Elite) in the region with Boromir. Then, draw two Strategy Event cards.

title: Huorn-dark (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn, or Orthanc. The Shadow player rolls a maximum of two dice in the Combat roll.

title: The Grey Company
requirements: Play if Strider/Aragorn is with a Free
rules_text: (C) Play if Strider/Aragorn is with a Free Peoples Army. Eliminate one Regular unit to recruit one Elite unit, of the same Nation, in the Army with Strider/Aragorn. Then, draw two Strategy Event cards.

title: Brave Stand (3)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. The Shadow player rolls one die less in his Combat roll for each Compan- ion present (to a minimum of one).

title: Brave Stand (3)
requirements: Play if a Companion is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Companion is in the battle. The Shadow player rolls one die less in his Combat roll for each Compan- ion present (to a minimum of one).

title: The Last Battle
rules_text: Play on the table if Aragorn or Gandalf the White are with a Free Peoples Army in South or North Ithilien, Dagorlad, Barad-Dur, Morannon, Minas Morgal, Nurn, or Gorgoroth While this card is in play, Action Dice used to move the Fellowship are not added to the Hunt Box. You must discard this card from the table as soon as there is not a Free Peoples Army in the Regions listed above.

title: A Power too Great
rules_text: Play on the table. Advance the Elven Nation one step on the Political Track While this card is in play, the Shadow player cannot move an Army into or attack (either in normal battle or in a siege) Lórien, Rivendell or The Grey Havens. The Shadow player can force “A Power too Great” to be discarded by using any one Action Die and discard- ing one Army Event card and one Character card from his hand.

title: Daylight (3)
rules_text: The Shadow player rolls a maximum of three dice in his Combat roll.

title: The Spirit of Mordor                  (A)
rules_text: Choose a Shadow Army anywhere on the board that is composed of units from at least two different Shadow Nations. Roll five dice and score one hit against this army for each result of 5+.

title: No Quarter (5)
rules_text: If your Combat roll or Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, score one additional hit.

title: Faramir’s Rangers
rules_text: Choose a Shadow Army in Osgiliath or South Ithilien or North Ithilien. Roll three dice and score one hit against this Army for each result of 5+. Then, if there is a Free Peoples Army in Osgiliath, recruit one Gondor unit (Regular or Elite) and one Gondor Leader there.

title: The Power of Tom Bombadil   (A)
rules_text: Play on the table. Advance the North Nation one step on the Political Track. While this card is in play, the Shadow player cannot move an Army into or attack The Old Forest, The Shire or Buckland. The Shadow player can force “The Power of Tom Bombadil” to be discarded by using any one Action Die and discarding one Army card and one Character card from his hand.

title: Advantageous Position (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is inside
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation. Subtract 1 from all dice on the Combat roll of the Shadow player (an unmodified “6” is still considered a hit for him).

title: Fear! Fire! Foes!
rules_text: Move any or all Companions on the map who are not in the Fellowship. Then, if a Companion is in The Shire or Bree, move the North Nation directly to the “At War” step, even if the North Nation is not active.

title: Book of Mazarbul                     (M)
rules_text: Move any or all Companions who are not in the Fellowship, Then, if a Companion is in Erebor or Ered Luin, move the Dwarves directly to the “At War” step, even if the Dwarven Nation is not Active.

title: Advantageous Position (3)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is inside
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation. Subtract 1 from all dice on the Combat roll of the Shadow player (an unmodified “6” is still considered a hit for him).

title: Wisdom of Elrond
rules_text: Activate one Free Peoples Nation of your choice and advance that Nation one step on the Political Track.

title: Scouts (1)
rules_text: Before the Combat roll, retreat your Army to an adjacent free region or withdraw into a siege.

title: Shield-Wall (6)
rules_text: Before you remove casualties inflicted by your opponent’s Combat roll and Leader re-roll, if your opponent scored two or more hits, cancel one hit.

title: Shield-Wall (6)
rules_text: Before you remove casualties inflicted by your opponent’s Combat roll and Leader re-roll, if your opponent scored two or more hits, cancel one hit.

title: Confusion (4)
rules_text: Every unmodified die result of “1” in the Shadow player’s Combat roll scores one hit against the Shadow Army. Any result of “1” cannot be rolled again during the Leader re-roll.

title: The Red Arrow
requirements: Play if Gondor is Active.
rules_text: Play if Gondor is Active. Advance Rohan one step on the Political Track. Then, recruit one Rohan unit (Regular or Elite) and one Rohan Leader in Edoras.

title: Help Unlooked For
rules_text: Attack a Shadow Army besieging a Stronghold with a Free Peoples Army in an adjacent region. For this entire battle, the Shadow player rolls one die less during the Combat roll for each Free Peoples unit in the besieged Stronghold (to a minimum of one).

title: Paths of the Woses
requirements: Play if there is a Free Peoples Army
rules_text: Play if there is a Free Peoples Army in Minis Tirith and Rohan is “At War”. Move a Free Peoples Army from any one Rohan region directly to Minas Tirith. If Minas Tirith is under siege, move the Army to a free region adjacent to Minas Tirith instead.

title: Scouts (1)
rules_text: Before the Combat roll, retreat your Army to an adjacent free region or withdraw into a siege.

title: No Quarter (5)
rules_text: If your Combat roll or Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, score one additional hit.

title: Cirdan’s Ships
requirements: Play if the Elves are “At War”.
rules_text: Play if the Elves are “At War”. Recruit two Elven units (Regular or Elite) in any one coastal region containing a Free Peoples Army.

title: Guards of the Citadel
rules_text: Recruit one Gondor unit (Regular or Elite) and one Gondor Leader in Minas Tirith.

requirements: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a
rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Leader or a Companion is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an addi- tional attack using a number of dice equal to your Leadership (up to a maximum of 5)and apply the result immediately.

title: Celeborn’s Galadhrim
rules_text: (M) Recruit one Elven unit (Regular or Elite) in Lórien. Then, draw one Strategy Event card.

title: Through a Day and a Night      (A)
rules_text: Play on a Free Peoples Army containing a Companion. Move the Army containing the Com- panion(s) up to two regions. The regions must be free for the purposes of Army movement, and no Free Peoples units may be picked up or dropped off along the way (other than, possibly, splitting the Army initially).
display_name: Through a Day and a Night

title: Confusion (4)
rules_text: Every unmodified die result of “1” in the Shadow player’s Combat roll scores one hit against the Shadow Army. Any result of “1” cannot be rolled again during the Leader re-roll.

title: Riders of Théoden
rules_text: (M) Recruit one Rohan unit (Regular or Elite) and one Leader in either Edoras or any Rohan region containing a Companion.

rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Elite unit is in the battle. Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using only the Free Peoples Elite units (up to a maximum of 5) and apply the result immediately.

title: Orc Patrol
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is not in a re-
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is not in a re- gion containing a Free Peoples Set- tlement. Draw a Hunt tile. If the tile shows an Eye or is a Fellowship special tile, discard it without effect. Otherwise, follow the rules for a successful Hunt.

title: Isuldur’s Bane
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is not in a
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is not in a region containing a Free Peoples Settlement. Draw a Hunt tile. If the tile shows an Eye or is a Fellowship special tile, discard it without effect. Otherwise, follow the rules for a successful Hunt, with the exception that the Free Peoples player must take all Hunt damage as Corruption.

title: Foul Thing from the Deep         (C)
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is not in a
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is not in a region containing a Free Peoples Settlement. Draw a Hunt tile. If the tile shows an Eye or is a Fellowship special tile, discard it without effect. Otherwise, follow the rules for a success- ful Hunt, with the exception that the Free Peoples player must reduce any Hunt damage by eliminating a random Companion (unless there are no Com- panions in the Fellowship).

title: Cruel as Death (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 2 or more. Subtract 2 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.

title: Cruel as Death (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 2 or more. Subtract 2 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.

title: They are Terrible (4)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. Subtract 1 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.

title: Candles of Corpses
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is not in a
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is not in a region containing a Free Peoples Settlement. Roll three dice and add one Corrup- tion point on each result of 4+. If Gollum is the Guide, add one Corruption points on each result of “6” instead.

title: Dread and Despair (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. Before the Combat roll, forfeit one or more points of Nazgûl Leadership. During this Combat roll, the Free Peoples player rolls one die less (to a minimum of 1) for every point you have chosen to forfeit.

title: Nazgûl Search
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is on step 1 or
rules_text: (C) Play if the Fellowship is on step 1 or higher on the Fellowship Track. Move any or all of the Nazgûl. Then, if at least one Nazgûl is in the region with the Fellowship, the Fel- lowship is revealed.

title: Cruel Weather
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is on step 1 or
rules_text: (C) Play if the Fellowship is on step 1 or higher on the Fellowship Track. Move the Ring-bearers to an adjacent region.

title: Foul Stench (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. If the Nazgûl Leadership equals or exceeds the total Free Peoples Leadership, the Free Peoples Leader re-roll is cancelled.

title: Cruel as Death (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 2 or more. Subtract 2 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.

title: The Nazgûl Strike!
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is on step 1 or
rules_text: (C) Play if the Fellowship is on step 1 or higher on the Fellowship Track. Move any or all of the Nazgûl. Then, if at least one Nazgûl is in the re- gion with the Ring-bearers, you may either discard one Free Peoples Charac- ter Event card from the table or roll for the Hunt (as if the Free Peoples player had moved the Fellowship).

title: Black Breath (6)
requirements: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle. If your Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, you may additionally eliminate one Free Peoples Leader participating in the battle. Alternatively, you can choose to eliminate a Companion in the battle, if the number of hits equals or exceeds that Companion’s Level.

title: Lure of the Ring
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is revealed.
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is revealed. Randomly select one Companion in the Fellowship by drawing a Companion counter. The Free Peoples player must choose either to add Corruption equal to the Companion’s Level or to eliminate him. If Gollum is the Guide, add one Corruption point instead.

title: They are Terrible (4)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. Subtract 1 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.

title: The Breaking of the Fellowship (C)
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is revealed.
Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is revealed. Draw a Hunt tile. If the tile shows an Eye or is a Fellowship special tile, discard it without effect. Otherwise, the Free Peoples player must separate a number of Companions equal to the number on the tile (if possible), placing them in the same region as the Ring-bearers. Ignore any “Reveal” or “Stop” icons on the tile. If Gollum is the Guide, add one Corruption point instead. Dread and Despair (3) Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. Before the Combat roll, forfeit one or more points of Nazgûl Leadership. During this Combat roll, the Free Peoples player rolls one die less (to a minimum of 1) for every point you have chosen to forfeit.

title: Worn with Sorrow and Toil      (C)
rules_text: Play on the table. When “Worn with Sorrow and Toil” is in play, if a Companion in the Fel- lowship is taken as a casualty you may also discard one of the Free Peoples player’s Character Event cards from his hand (choosing it ran- domly) or from the table. You must discard this card from the table immediately if the Fellowship is declared in a Free Peoples City or Stronghold controlled by the Free Peoples.

title: Words of Power (1)
requirements: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle. Choose a Companion. That Compan- ion’s Leadership and special abilities are cancelled for this Combat round. 15

title: Morgul Wound
requirements: Play if the Fellowship is revealed.
rules_text: Play if the Fellowship is revealed. If the Fellowship’s current Corruption is three or less, add two Corruption points; otherwise add one Corruption point.

title: Black Breath (6)
requirements: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle. If your Leader re-roll scores at least one hit, you may additionally eliminate one Free Peoples Leader participating in the battle. Alternatively, you can choose to eliminate a Companion in the battle, if the number of hits equals or exceeds that Companion’s Level.

title: Flocks of Crebain
rules_text: Play on the table. Before you make a Hunt roll, you may discard “Flocks of Crebain” to add 1 to all dice on that Hunt roll (including re-rolls). You must discard this card from the table immediately if the Fellowship is declared in a Free Peoples City or Stronghold.

title: They are Terrible (4)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. Subtract 1 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.

title: Balrog of Moria
rules_text: Play on the table. You may discard “Balrog of Moria” to draw an additional Hunt tile if the Fel- lowship moves into, out of, or through Moria while being declared or revealed. If the tile shows an Eye, discard it without effect; otherwise follow the rules for a suc- cessful Hunt. Ignore any “Reveal” icon on the drawn tile if the Fellowship has been declared in a Free Peoples City or Stronghold. Or you may discard “Balrog of Moria” to use its Com- bat effect as if you were playing the card from your hand.

title: Durin’s Bane (2)
requirements: Play if the defending Army is within two
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is within two regions of Moria Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using three combat dice. Score hits on 4+ and apply the result immediately.

title: The Palantír of Orthanc             (C)
rules_text: Play on the table if Saruman is in play. When “The Palantír of Orthanc” is in play, every time you use an Event Ac- tion Die result to play an Event card, immediately draw another card from either one of your decks. The Free Peoples player can force “The Palantír of Orthanc” to be discarded by either using a Will of the West Action Die result, or using any Action Die and one Elven Ring. You must discard this card if Saruman is eliminated.

title: Cruel as Death (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 2 or more. Subtract 2 from your total Nazgûl Leadership to add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll.

title: The Lidless Eye
rules_text: (C) Change up to three unused Shadow Action Dice results into “Eye” results. Place the dice in the Hunt Box immediately.

title: Dreadful Spells
requirements: Play if a Shadow Army  containing a
rules_text: (C) Play if a Shadow Army containing a Nazgûl is adjacent to, or is in the same region as, a Free Peoples Army. Roll a number of dice equal to the number of Nazgûl in that Army (up to a maximum of 5) and score one hit for each result of 5+.

title: Words of Power (1)
requirements: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle. Choose a Companion. That Compan- ion’s Leadership and special abilities are cancelled for this Combat round. 18

title: Devilry of Orthanc (3)
requirements: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in
rules_text: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the battle and the defending Army is in a Stronghold. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. 19

title: The Ringwraiths Are Abroad    (C)
rules_text: Move any or all of the Nazgûl. Then, you may either move two Armies each containing a Nazgûl, or attack with one Army containing a Nazgûl.

title: Grond, Hammer of the              (C)
requirements: Play if the Witch-king is in play and
rules_text: Underworld Play if the Witch-king is in play and is with a Shadow Army besieging a Free Peoples Stronghold. Attack that Stronghold. The Siege lasts for three Combat rounds in- stead of one. During the first round, the Free Peoples player cannot use a Combat card unless a Companion is in the battle.

title: Dread and Despair (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. Before the Combat roll, forfeit one or more points of Nazgûl Leadership. During this Combat roll, the Free Peoples player rolls one die less (to a minimum of 1) for every point you have chosen to forfeit.

title: The Black Captain Commands (C)
requirements: Play if the Witch-king is in play.
rules_text: Play if the Witch-king is in play. You may either recruit two Nazgûl in the region containing the Witch-king, or move any or all of the Nazgûl. Then, you may move or attack with an Army containing the Witch-king.

title: Wormtongue
rules_text: (C) Play on the table if Saruman is in play. When “Wormtongue” is in play, Ro- han cannot be activated except by a Companion’s special ability, or by the Fellowship being declared in Edoras or Helm’s Deep, or by an attack on Edoras or Helm’s Deep. You must discard this card from the table as soon as Rohan is activated, or if Saruman is eliminated.

title: Foul Stench (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. If the Nazgûl Leadership equals or exceeds the total Free Peoples Leadership, the Free Peoples Leader re-roll is cancelled.

title: Words of Power (1)
requirements: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle.
rules_text: Play if a Nazgûl is in the battle. Choose a Companion. That Compan- ion’s Leadership and special abilities are cancelled for this Combat round. 23

title: Foul Stench (3)
requirements: Play if the total Nazgûl
rules_text: Play if the total Nazgûl Leadership is 1 or more. If the Nazgûl Leadership equals or exceeds the total Free Peoples Leadership, the Free Peoples Leader re-roll is cancelled.

title: Return to Valinor
requirements: Play if you control at least one Elven
rules_text: (A) Play if you control at least one Elven Stronghold. For each region with an Elven Stronghold which is not under siege, roll a number of dice equal to the number of Elven Army units in that region (up to a maximum of 5) and score one hit against that Army for each result of “6”.

title: The Fighting Uruk-hai
requirements: Play if Saruman is in play, and if an
rules_text: Play if Saruman is in play, and if an Army containing an Isengard unit is besieging a Stronghold. Attack that Stronghold. The Siege lasts for three Combat rounds in- stead of one. During the first round, the Free Peoples player cannot use a Combat card unless a Companion is in the battle.

title: Denethor’s Folly
rules_text: Play on the table if Minas Tirith is besieged by a Shadow Army. When you play this card, immedi- ately eliminate one Free Peoples Leader in Minas Tirith. When “Denethor’s Folly” is in play, the Free Peoples player cannot use Combat cards for battles fought in Minas Tirith. The Free Peoples player can force “Denethor’s Folly” to be discarded using a Will of the West Action Die result, or any Action Die if Gandalf or Aragorn is in Minas Tirith.

title: Devilry of Orthanc (3)
requirements: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the
rules_text: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the battle and the defending Army is in a Stronghold. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. 3

title: The Day Without Dawn             (A)
requirements: Play if all Shadow Nations are “At
rules_text: Play if all Shadow Nations are “At War”. Discard all unused Free Peoples Action Dice that show a Will of the West result.

title: Relentless Assault (3)
rules_text: Before the Combat roll, you may inflict and apply up to two hits against your units. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll for each hit you inflicted.

title: Onslaught (7)
rules_text: After removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll, you may inflict and apply up to four additional hits against your units. Roll one die for each hit you inflicted to your units and score one hit against the enemy on each result of 4+.

title: Stormcrow
requirements: Play if either the Ring-bearers or a
rules_text: Play if either the Ring-bearers or a Companion is inside the borders of a Free Peoples Nation not “At War”. Move that Nation’s Political Counter back one step on the Political Track. Then, the Free Peoples player must eliminate one Leader or Army unit of that Nation (Regular or Elite).

title: Shadows Gather
rules_text: Move one Shadow Army up to three regions. The movement must end in a region already occupied by another Shadow Army (that must not be under siege). The regions must be free for the purposes of Army movement, and no Shadow units may be picked up or dropped off along the way (other than, possibly, splitting the Army initially).

title: The Shadow Lengthens             (A)
rules_text: Move two Shadow Armies up to two regions. Each movement must end in a region already occupied by another Shadow Army (that must not be under siege). The regions must be free for the purposes of Army movement, and no Shadow units may be picked up or dropped off along the way (other than, possibly, splitting the Army initially).

title: Devilry of Orthanc (3)
requirements: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in
rules_text: Play if an Isengard Army unit is in the battle and the defending Army is in a Stronghold. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. 5

title: Great Host (7)
rules_text: If, after removing casualties from the Combat roll and Leader re-roll, your Army units are at least twice as many as the enemy Army units, score one automatic hit.

title: Mûmakil (3-5)
requirements: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite
rules_text: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite unit is in the battle. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. If, after the Leader re-roll, you scored more total hits than your opponent (including hits from any Free Peoples pre-Combat attack from a Combat card), score one additional hit.

title: Mûmakil (3-5)
requirements: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite
rules_text: Play if a Southrons & Easterlings Elite unit is in the battle. Add 1 to all dice on your Combat roll. If, after the Leader re-roll, you scored more total hits than your opponent (including hits from any Free Peoples pre-Combat attack from a Combat card), score one additional hit.

rules_text: Both Armies add 2 to all dice on their Combat and Leader re-roll.

title: Threats and Promises              (M)
rules_text: Play on the table. When “Threats and Promises” is in play, the Free Peoples player cannot advance a passive Nation on the Po- litical Track using a Muster Action Die. You must discard this card from the table as soon as a Free Peoples Na- tion advances on the Political Track either due to an attack or due to a Companion’s special Ability.

requirements: Play if all Shadow Nations are “At
rules_text: Play if all Shadow Nations are “At War”. Move up to four different Shadow Armies up to one region each.

requirements: Play if the Southrons & Easterlings
rules_text: Play if the Southrons & Easterlings are “At War”. Move one Shadow Army from Umbar to any Gondor coastal region. If there is a Free Peoples Army in the region, a battle starts. The attacking Shadow Army cannot retreat.

title: Rage of the Dunlendings         (M)
requirements: Play if Isengard is “At War”.
rules_text: Play if Isengard is “At War”. Recruit two Isengard Regular units in a free region adjacent to North or South Dunland. You may also move to this region up to four Isengard units. (Regular or Elite) from North Dunland and/or South Dunland.

title: Return of the Witch-king         (M)
requirements: Play if the Witch-king is in play.
rules_text: Play if the Witch-king is in play. Move the Witch-king to Angmar and recruit two Sauron Regular units and one Sauron Elite there.

rules_text: Cancel the effects of the Combat card played by the Free Peoples player. If the Free Peoples player did not play a card, add 1 to all dice on your Leader re-roll.

title: Wind from the West
rules_text: Discard any one Shadow Event card on the table. If not Shadow Event card is on the table, you may look at the Event cards in the hand of one Shadow player and discard one card.

requirements: Play if the defending Army is in a
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn, or Orthanc. Add 2 to all dice on your Combat roll. 19E

requirements: Play if the defending Army is in a
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is in a Rohan region, Fangorn, or Orthanc. If your Combat or Leader re-roll score at least one hit, score two additional hits.

title: Rangers of the North
rules_text: Choose a Shadow Army inside, or in a region bordering, the North Nation. Roll three dice and score one hit against this Army for each result of 5+. Then, recruit one North unit (Regular or Elite) and one North Leader in any free region of the North Nation adjacent to the attacked region.

title: Threat to the Fiefs
requirements: Play if the Corsairs of Umbar
rules_text: of the South Play if the Corsairs of Umbar faction is in play. Recruit one Gondor Regular unit in each of Pelargir, Lossarnach, and Lamedon. One at a time, roll a die for each Corsair Ship in any Gondor region. Each Ship is removed on a result of 4+.

rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Siege Engine is in the battle. Add the number of your Siege Engines to the strength of the Free Peoples Army (you can still roll a maximum of 5 Combat dice).

rules_text: Play if a Free Peoples Siege Engine is in the battle. Add the number of your Siege Engines to the strength of the Free Peoples Army (you can still roll a maximum of 5 Combat dice).

rules_text: Play on the table if the Balrog is in play. The movement of the Balrog is con- sidered to be 2 while this card is in play. The Free Peoples Player can force “A Balrog is Come!” to be discarded either using a Will of the West Action Die result, or a Character Action Die result if Gandalf is in the same region as the Balrog. Eliminate the Balrog if he is not in Moria when this card is discarded.

requirements: Play if the defending Army is within two
rules_text: Play if the defending Army is within two regions of Moria Before the Combat roll, roll an additional attack using three combat dice. Score hits on 4+ and apply the result immediately.

title: The Gates are Closed
rules_text: Play on the table. If the Fellowship goes into, out of, or through a Shadow Stronghold while be- ing declared or revealed, you may dis- card “The Gates are Closed” to draw an additional Hunt tile. If the tile shows an Eye, discard it without effect. Otherwise, follow the rules for a successful Hunt. Ignore any reveal icon. The Free Peoples Player can force “The Gates are Closed” to be discarded by either using a Will of the West Action Die result, or a Character Action Die result if Gandalf or Gollum is the Guide.

title: Captain of Despair
rules_text: Play on the table if The Witch-king is in play and Gollum is not the Guide of the Fellowship. Every Character Action die result used by the Shadow player is added to the Hunt box as an eye die when the action is completed. You must discard this card from the table immediately if the Fellowship is declared in a Free Peoples Stronghold controlled by the Free Peoples, or if Gollum becomes the Guide of the Fellowship.

title: The Corsairs are upon us!         (A)
requirements: Play if the Corsairs of Umbar
rules_text: Play if the Corsairs of Umbar faction is in play. You may move any or all of the Ships. Then, you may move one Army from a region containing a Ship to a region free for the purposes of Army movement which also contains a Ship. You may then move or attack with that Army. If a battle starts, during the first round the Free Peoples player cannot play a Combat card.

requirements: Play if a Shadow Army Siege Engine is in

rules_text: Play if the Hillmen of Dunland faction is in play. Recruit up to four Dunlendings and add them to a Shadow Army in ei- ther North or South Dunland (respecting the stacking limit). You may then move or attack with that Army.
